name: Chaos City (PixelPyrex)
description:
Instruction:

W / S - Move Forward / Backward

A / D - Rotate Left / Right

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Hint:

- Some Props can be destroyed

- Sometime, destroyed enemy / Props drop Health Bulb

- Red Bulb = + 20 HP

- Gold Bulb = + 20 HP

- Gold Bulb can only obtained from green enemy tank

- Enemy type based on the turret color

Credit:

- Stephen Sugiharto @ChainofChaos (Programmer)

- Yotam Niki @Yotam N (Programmer)

- Flay#9869 (3D Artist)
